verses.name: John 6:28
verses.text: Then said they unto him, What shall we do, that we might work the works of God?

verses.name: John 6:29
verses.text: Jesus answered and said unto them, This is the work of God, that ye believe on him whom he hath sent.

verses.name: John 6:30
verses.text: They said therefore unto him, What sign shewest thou then, that we may see, and believe thee? what dost thou work?

verses.name: John 6:31
verses.text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert; as it is written, He gave them bread from heaven to eat.
